item.description:
Come down and help out at the third annual FPA Pancake Breakfast Fly in. Last year we had a fun day with a bunch of people flying in and having breakfast. We setup at the picnic area on the runway side of Bullock's hangar.

The last few years have seen a Helicopter and a Stearman show up offering rides to the hardest working volunteers. Who knows what we may attract this year?!? :)

 

Setup crew should get there at 7:00am with the official start time at 8:00am.

Breakfast served from 8:00am to 11:00am

Didn't get a chance to attend last year, see what you missed.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA Pancake Breakfast Fly in
